TEXT: #gFoil - Gain #b50 #yGold the first time this card is played. NL #gHolo - After you play this card, gain #b10 temporary #yStrength. NL #gPolychrome - #b50% chance to be played an additional time. NL #gNegative - When you draw this card, draw a card.
Choose 3 cards to apply editions to
Return any number of #yRental cards to the merchant, removing them from your deck.

TEXT_DICT.Arm_Description: Permanently replace the first upgraded card you play with a plain, unupgraded version.
TEXT_DICT.Eye_Description: Lose 3 HP when you play the same card type twice in a row.
TEXT_DICT.Fish_Description: Cards drawn after the start of your turn are drawn face down.
TEXT_DICT.Flint_Description: Disable half of your relics randomly.
TEXT_DICT.Head: [${ModID}:HeadIcon] The Head
TEXT_DICT.Hook_Description: Whenever you play a card, discard 2 cards, and draw that many.
TEXT_DICT.House_Description: First hand is drawn face down.
TEXT_DICT.Manacle_Description: Draw 1 less card at the start of each turn.
TEXT_DICT.Mark_Description: All powers are drawn face down.
TEXT_DICT.Mouth_Description: Lose 3 HP when you play a card that has a different type than the first card played each turn.
TEXT_DICT.Needle_Description: Enemies have half health. Draw 5 additional cards and gain 3 additional [E] at the start of your first turn. Lose 10 HP at the end of each of your turns.
TEXT_DICT.Ox_Description: Set money to 0 when you play your most played card.
TEXT_DICT.Pillar_Description: Cards become debuffed after playing them.
TEXT_DICT.Psychic_Description: Lose 3 HP per unspent energy at the end of each turn.
TEXT_DICT.Serpent_Description: Draw 3 cards at the start of your turns. Whenever you play a card, draw 3 cards.
TEXT_DICT.Water_Description: At the end of your turns, shuffle your discard pile into your draw pile.
TEXT_DICT.Wheel_Description: 1 in 7 cards get drawn face down.
